sourcesContent:
<template>
<el-menu mode="vertical" @select="changeIndex">
  <el-menu-item index="switchTheme">
    主题选择
  </el-menu-item>
</el-menu>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "settingsPage",
  data(){
    return{
      selectedIndex: '',
      switchTheme: false,
    }
  },
  methods: {
    changeIndex(index){
      this.selectedIndex = index
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
